alert.note: Alert for Freeborn; Goodhue; Rice; Steele; Waseca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 11 at 11:10AM CST until January 13 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Steady snow tonight through Friday night with total snow accumulations of 5 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Rice, Goodhue, Waseca, Steele and Freeborn Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero will develop and could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
